dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1488 RH: Indiana Dunes National Park Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Visclosky (for himself, Mrs. Walorski, Mr. Banks of Indiana, Mr. Rokita, Mrs. Brooks of Indiana, Mr. Messer, Mr. Carson of Indiana, Mr. Bucshon, and Mr. Hollingsworth) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on March 9, 2017

form.official-title: To retitle Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore as Indiana Dunes National Park, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Indiana Dunes National Park Act.

section.header: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore retitled as Indiana Dunes National Park

subsection.text: Public Law 89–761 (16 U.S.C. 460u et seq.) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking National Lakeshore and national lakeshore each place it appears and inserting National Park; and
by striking lakeshore each place it appears and inserting Park.

subsection.text: The amendment made by subsection (a)(1) shall not apply to the title of the map referred to in the first section of Public Law 89–761 (16 U.S.C. 460u), or to the title of the maps referred to in section 4 of Public Law 89–761 (16 U.S.C. 460u–3).

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
